articles.title: Assassin's Creed, Far Cry and Rainbow Six Now Operated by Vantage Studios, Ubisoft and Tencent's New Business Group With Full Autonomy on Creative Direction and Business Plans

articles.title: Meta Ray-Ban Display Sells Out As Early Adopters Struggle To Buy
articles.snippet:
Meta Ray-Ban Display is now sold out in almost every store it was available in.
Restocks are "coming", Meta says, and the company is doubling the number of stores offering the glasses.

articles.title: Nacon’s Revolution X Unlimited Xbox Controller Equips You With Pro-Level Tuning
articles.snippet: Incredible levels of customization set this controller apart from the pack. For a price.

articles.title: HUAWEI WATCH GT 6 Pro Review | Geek Lifestyle
articles.snippet: The HUAWEI WATCH GT 6 Pro is proof of the brand's commitment to bringing wearables that can keep up with various lifestyles.

articles.title: Copper Prices Climb As Chile And Indonesia Face Supply Issues
articles.snippet: Shrinking inventories, weaker dollar, and global supply problems outweigh slow demand to lift copper and other metals.

articles.title: Starbucks closes San Jose stores as competitor moves in

articles.title: Singtel rings up no tax as miners and banks support the budget
articles.snippet: The parent company of Optus has for the fourth successive year managed to record $8 billion in income without paying company tax.

articles.title: Qantas closes more bases, staff be damned
articles.snippet: Qantas has made the decision to close more bases in the name of Vanessa Hudson's cost-cutting scheme, angering pilots, staff and unions.
